tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ethics_approval (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  research_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  researcher_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  research_description TEXT,
  submission_date TIMESTAMP,
  approval_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE research_projects (
 project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 researcher_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 research_description TEXT NOT NULL,
 approval_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE approval_logs (
 log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 project_id INT NOT NULL,
 approval_date DATE NOT NULL,
 approval_granted_by VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 comments TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE research_projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR,
    project_description TEXT,
    researcher_id INT,
    approval_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE researchers (
    researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_name VARCHAR,
    researcher_email VARCHAR,
    department VARCHAR,
    position VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE research_projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_title VARCHAR(255),
    researcher_name VARCHAR(100),
    approval_status VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE research_subjects (
    subject_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    subject_name VARCHAR(100),
    subject_age INT,
    subject_gender VARCHAR(10),
    project_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES research_projects(project_id)
)

CREATE TABLE research_approvals (
    approval_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    approval_date DATE,
    approval_notes TEXT,
    committee_member VARCHAR(100),
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES research_projects(project_id)
)

CREATE TABLE committee_members (
    member_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    member_name VARCHAR(100),
    member_email VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE committee_meetings (
    meeting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_date DATE,
    meeting_location VARCHAR(100),
    member_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (member_id) REFERENCES committee_members(member_id)
)
